Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Navigation system GPS signal loss. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 18/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
